SELECT ci.id, ci.name, ci.`unit_account` unitAccount, ci.`unit_code` unitCode, ci.`id_code` idCode, ci.`types`, ci.`contact`, ci.`phone`, ci.`address`, ci.`email`, ci.`legal_entity` legalEntity, ci.`invoice_code` invoiceCode, ci.`tfn`, ci.`if_contract` ifContract, ci.`settlement_type` settlementType, ci.`account_period` accountPeriod, ci.`estate`, ci.`department_id` departmentId, d.`name` departmentName, ci.`ku_id` kuId, su1.`user_name` kuName, ci.`yw_id` ywId, su2.`user_name` ywName, ci.`audit_status` auditStatus, ( CASE ci.`audit_status` WHEN '0' THEN '待客服审核' WHEN '1' THEN '待财务审核' WHEN '2' THEN '待总经办审核' WHEN '10' THEN '审核通过' WHEN '11' THEN '审核拒绝' END ) auditStatusDesc, ci.`created_user` createdUser, DATE_FORMAT( ci.`created_time`, '%Y-%m-%d %H %I %S' ) createdTimeStr, ci.`updated_user` updatedUser, ci.`audit_comment` auditComment, DATE_FORMAT( ci.`updated_time`, '%Y-%m-%d %H %I %S' ) updatedTimeStr FROM customer_info ci LEFT JOIN department d ON ci.`department_id` = d.`id` LEFT JOIN `system_user` su1 ON su1.`id` = ci.`ku_id` LEFT JOIN `system_user` su2 ON su2.`id` = ci.`yw_id` where ci.`status` = 1
and ci.name like concat('%',#{form.name},'%')

SELECT ci.id, ci.name, ci.`unit_account` unitAccount, ci.`unit_code` unitCode, ci.`id_code` idCode, ci.`types`, ci.`contact`, ci.`phone`, ci.`address`, ci.`email`, ci.`legal_entity` legalEntity, ci.`invoice_code` invoiceCode, ci.`tfn`, ci.`if_contract` ifContract, ci.`settlement_type` settlementType, ci.`account_period` accountPeriod, ci.`estate`, ci.`department_id` departmentId, d.`name` departmentName, ci.`ku_id` kuId, su1.`user_name` kuName, ci.`yw_id` ywId, su2.`user_name` ywName, ci.`audit_status` auditStatus, ( CASE ci.`audit_status` WHEN '0' THEN '待客服审核' WHEN '1' THEN '待财务审核' WHEN '2' THEN '待总经办审核' WHEN '10' THEN '审核通过' WHEN '11' THEN '审核拒绝' END ) auditStatusDesc, ci.`created_user` createdUser, DATE_FORMAT( ci.`created_time`, '%Y-%m-%d %H %I %S' ) createdTimeStr, ci.`updated_user` updatedTimeStr, ci.`audit_comment` auditComment, DATE_FORMAT( ci.`updated_time`, '%Y-%m-%d %H %I %S' ) updatedTimeStr FROM customer_info ci LEFT JOIN department d ON ci.`department_id` = d.`id` LEFT JOIN `system_user` su1 ON su1.`id` = ci.`ku_id` LEFT JOIN `system_user` su2 ON su2.`id` = ci.`yw_id` where 1 = 1 and ci.id = #{id}

SELECT su.id, su.name, su.`en_user_name` enUserName, su.`user_name` userName, sr.`name` roleName, sr.`id` roleId, ci.`name` companyName, ci.id companyId, (SELECT t.user_name FROM `system_user` t WHERE t.id = su.`superior_id`) departChargeName, (SELECT t.id FROM `system_user` t WHERE t.id = su.`superior_id`) departmentChargeId, ( CASE su.`status` WHEN '0' THEN '关闭' WHEN '1' THEN '启用' END ) statusDesc, su.`created_user` createdUser, DATE_FORMAT( su.`created_time`, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S' ) createdTimeStr FROM `system_user` su LEFT JOIN system_user_role_relation surr ON su.`id` = surr.`user_id` LEFT JOIN system_role sr ON surr.`role_id` = sr.`id` LEFT JOIN customer_info ci ON su.`company_id` = ci.`id` WHERE su.id = #{id}
